New Records: Donovan Mitchell scored 22 points, Darius Garland scored 23 points, Jarrett Allen had 25 points and 16 rebounds, Evan Mobley had 15 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists, and Dean Wade scored 14 points in the game against the Chicago Bulls.
Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers lost to the Chicago Bulls 139-137 in overtime during the preseason finale.
Post-Match Reflections: Kenny Atkinson expressed frustration over the 0-4 preseason record but emphasized the importance of moving forward and being prepared for the regular season opener against the Toronto Raptors.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers' core four players performed well in the game, despite the loss. Max Strus will miss at least six weeks due to a right ankle sprain.
